charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC., 18:924(a), having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, knowingly did possess in and affecting commerce, a firearm and ammunition all of which had been shipped and transported in interstate commerce (1)

knowingly possess in and affecting commerce a firearm and ammunition all of which had been shipped and transported in interstate commerce while being a felon having been convicted of a crime punishable by a term of imprisonment exceeding one year, in violation of 18:922(g)(1) and 924(a) [4:02-m-1341]
